laboratory_examinations.findings: High VSBV-1 RNA loads observed in the squirrel brain, heart, lung, kidney, and oropharyngeal-swab samples. Intermediate viral genome loads in FFPE brain samples from Patients 1 and 2. High VSBV-1 RNA loads in the brain of Patient 3.
Positive immunostaining in the nuclei, cytoplasm, and neuronal and glial processes of brain cells for viral proteins N, X, and P in the squirrel and Patient 1.
Bornavirus-specific IgG antibodies detected in serum and cerebrospinal fluid from Patient 3; titers of 1:2560 in CSF and 1:5120 in serum.
Pleocytosis was noted in the cerebrospinal fluid.
Delta activity with short alpha episodes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In August 2013, low-voltage theta and delta activity was observed; in December 2013, delta and theta activity was recorded.
Follow-up 3 weeks after the initial scan showed hyperintense lesions in the cortex.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial scan was normal, followed by hyperintense lesions 10 days after the initial scan.
